about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover our story, mission, and vision at HELDEN, Saudi Arabia's premier women's fashion destination.
about.heroContent: HELDEN began in 2021 with a simple yet powerful vision: to offer women in Saudi Arabia an exceptional fashion experience that celebrates both traditional values and modern aesthetics. What started as a small boutique in Riyadh has grown into Saudi Arabia's leading destination for women's fashion, bringing together carefully curated collections that honor our rich heritage while embracing global trends.
about.missionContent: At HELDEN, we are dedicated to empowering women through fashion that respects cultural values while encouraging individual expression. We believe that clothing is more than fabric—it's a statement of identity, confidence, and purpose.
about.visionContent: To be recognized as the foremost women's fashion retailer in Saudi Arabia, setting the standard for quality, elegance, and customer experience while contributing positively to our community and environment.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We source only the finest materials and partner with ethical manufacturers to ensure exceptional craftsmanship in every piece.

elegance.title: Elegance
elegance.description: We believe in timeless style that transcends trends, offering sophisticated designs that make women feel confident and beautiful.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to responsible fashion practices that minimize environmental impact and promote ethical production standards.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We pour our hearts into everything we do, from designing collections to providing exceptional customer service.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The passionate individuals behind HELDEN's success

founder.name: Norah Al-Saud
founder.bio: With over 15 years in luxury fashion, Norah brings her vision of elegant, culturally resonant fashion to Saudi women.

operations.name: Sara Al-Qahtani
operations.bio: Sara ensures that every aspect of HELDEN runs smoothly, from supply chain to customer experience.

design.name: Leila Mahmoud
design.bio: A graduate of Central Saint Martins, Leila blends Western techniques with Middle Eastern aesthetics.

marketing.name: Amal Ibrahim
marketing.bio: Amal has revolutionized HELDEN's digital presence, creating authentic connections with our community.

joinUs.title: Join the HELDEN Community
joinUs.description: Be part of our journey to redefine women's fashion in Saudi Arabia. Follow us on social media and sign up for our newsletter to stay updated on our latest collections and exclusive offers.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heroSubtitle: We're here to help with any questions about our collections, orders, or services.
contact.getInTouchText: Have questions or need assistance? Our dedicated customer support team is ready to help you with any inquiries, from product information to order tracking.

address.title: Visit Our Store
address.content: Al Olaya District, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
terms.welcome: Welcome to HELDEN. By accessing our website and services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. These terms govern your use of our website, mobile applications, and all related services offered by HELDEN.

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: When you create an account with HELDEN, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account details and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account. If you suspect unauthorized use of your account, you must notify us immediately. We reserve the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, or cancel orders at our discretion.

orders.title: Orders & Purchases
orders.content: By placing an order with HELDEN, you are making an offer to purchase products. All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse any order without giving reason. Once we accept your order, we will confirm this by sending an order confirmation email. The contract for sale of products is formed when we send this email.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.content: HELDEN currently ships within Saudi Arabia only. Standard delivery typically takes 3-5 business days, while express delivery is available for 1-2 business days. Delivery times are estimates and not guaranteed. We are not responsible for delays beyond our control. Risk of loss and title for items purchased pass to you upon delivery of the items to the carrier.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.content: You may return most new, unopened items within 14 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it, with all original packaging and tags. To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, Mada, Apple Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners. Prices for products are as quoted on our website and are inclusive of VAT where applicable. We reserve the right to change prices for products displayed at any time, and to correct pricing errors.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms and Conditions, explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our services, you consent to our collection and use of personal data as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content included on HELDEN's website and services, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of HELDEN or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. The compilation of all content on this site is the exclusive property of HELDEN. You may not reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell, or exploit any portion of the service without express written permission.

contact.title: Questions About Our Terms?
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms and Conditions, please don't hesitate to contact us:

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.sarah: I've been shopping at HELDEN for years, and their quality never disappoints. The materials are premium, and the designs are always in style. Highly recommend for any woman looking for elegant clothing.
testimonials.fatima: As a fashion blogger, I'm very selective about the brands I wear. HELDEN has consistently impressed me with their attention to detail and commitment to quality. Their abayas are a staple in my wardrobe.
testimonials.noor: Working in a corporate environment, I need clothing that is both professional and stylish. HELDEN's formal wear collection is perfect - modest yet modern, and always garnering compliments.
testimonials.amina: Being a university student, I need affordable yet stylish options, and HELDEN delivers exactly that. Their casual wear is perfect for my busy day-to-day life, and the prices don't break my budget.
